name: Attack on MotherShip
description:
Attack on MotherShip is a hybrid game of shooter and tower defense, where you fight against waves of enemies trying to attack your MotherShip while your defend it with your fighter and towers. 

      This game is a remake of a game of the same name I made with a friend for the Ludum Dare 41 in 2018, the original had lots of bugs and I really wanted to make a new version of it. This year I challenged myself to make a game in a month, hence the choice made was obvious to Me, this was 4 months ago (This game was posted in August/2020 if you are seeing it past this).

      Soon after the beginning, I knew this one month project would take longer, many mistakes were made when making the models of the spaceships would appear, many times redoing the same export process to correct my mistakes. Then came the bugs while coding. 

      With every error, I became more and more frustrated, at some point the thoughts about cancelling the project and delete it from existence filled my mind, I got burnout. But kept going, was halfway through it. 

      I tried my best to deliver a good polished experience. It's not my first project, but the first one released to the public in what I see as a complete game. It is a short experience, but I hope it will be a good one.

      Everything about how to play is in the Help menu in the game.

      Feedback is appreciated.
